snippet: Tuesday's Lens blog features a conversation with Mr. Haner, one of the Lens blog's co-editors, about the task of making a good picture in spite of the theatricality. Sometimes that means embracing it.
abstract: Tuesday's Lens blog features a conversation with Mr. Haner, one of the Lens blog's co-editors, about the task of making a good picture in spite of the theatricality. Sometimes that means embracing it.

headline.main: On Lens: In Iowa With Times Photographer Josh Haner
